Talk_03_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:ShidoAizuchi_01>The fifth sage...<sp:5:0:0> Once you have located
Mineru and the sages have gathered,
it shall be time to face the Demon King!
Just remember that you are never alone,
my friend. I will have your back when the
time to confront that wretch is at hand!
Talk_07:
<sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:Greeting_01>Ah, Link!<sp:5:1:0> Thanks for stopping by.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0701>The revival of the Demon King draws near.<sp:5:1:0>
I know you have much on your mind. Have
you come to check on the domain?
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Happy_01>Or are you, perhaps, intrigued by
that ancient passage regarding a
<clr:0000>secret treasure<clr:ffff>?
Comment_13:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:ShidoAizuchi_00>Well! In any case, Link...<sp:5:1:0> Is there
something else you would like to
speak with me about?
EndEvent_Npc_15_00:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Greeting>Link! I am overjoyed to see you,
my friend.<sp:0:4:0>I am still gathering information on the
whereabouts of Princess Zelda.

<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:Happy_01>Your journey must continue ever onward,
eh?<sp:5:1:0> I shall be with you in spirit, as always.<sp:5:0:0>
Call upon me whenever you please.
EndEvent_Npc_11:
<sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:Greeting_01>Link... It seems the time has come for you
to resume your heroic travels once again.

I will continue seeking out information on
our vanished Princess Zelda, you have
my word.
I am quite certain that the search for the
princess will not be easy. Such important
endeavors never are, are they?
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:Happy_01>But no matter what transpires, know that I
am always with you. Should you ever have
need of me, simply ask and I shall appear!
EndEvent_Npc_16_00_00:
<sp:3:0:2:0b01><snd:SurpriseL_01>What is this?! <sp:5:1:0>You found the secret
treasure?
EndEvent_Npc_14:
<sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:ShidoAizuchi_01>I will continue seeking out information on
our vanished Princess Zelda, you have
my word.
No matter what transpires, know that I am
always with you. Should you ever have
need of me, simply ask and I shall appear!
EndEvent_Npc_16_00_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0b01><snd:SurpriseL_01>What is this? <sp:5:1:0>That item upon your heroic
head... That is none other than the
secret treasure, is it not?!
Talk_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:Greeting_01>Ah, Link!<sp:5:0:0> I am overjoyed to see you!


Apologies, but I have still yet to find any
meaningful clues about the fifth sage...

<sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:Determination_00>Worry not, I shall continue the search!
EndEvent_Npc_15:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:Greeting_01>Ah, Link!


I have yet to uncover any meaningful
clues about the fifth sage.

<sp:3:0:2:0001>Or was there something else you were
hoping to speak of?
Talk_02:
<sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:ShidoAizuchi_01>We must find the fifth sage,<sp:5:0:0> no matter the
cost.<sp:5:1:0> I shall keep searching for clues!
EndEvent_Npc_16:
<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:Happy_00>You are truly amazing! <sp:5:0:0>That is the Link
that I have come to admire so!<sp:5:1:0>

<sp:3:0:2:0001>Hm, it seems the secret treasure was
the same helmet that the Sage of Water
was wearing.
This feeling...it is as though that item
is resonating with the Sage of Water's
power within me...
Talk_03:
<sp:3:0:2:0b00>Hm?!<sp:5:1:0> Is it true that you have discovered
the fifth sage?

I have been tirelessly searching for
clues<sp:5:1:0> in ancient texts and the ruins
of this region.
<sp:3:0:2:0500><snd:Think>It must be destiny of a sort that you would
find another sage after already finding the
rest of us.<sp:5:1:0>
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:TalkPositive_01>So, the fifth sage is a Zonai from ancient
times...<sp:5:1:0>and her name is Mineru!

To think that even as a spirit, she is
attempting to fulfill her destiny as
a sage...
<sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:Happy>It is heartening to know that we have a
new ally!<sp:5:1:0> I must achieve perfect focus in
preparation for the final battle...
EndEvent_Npc_17:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:Happy_01>Link! <sp:5:1:0>You must make good use of
that helmet!<sp:0:4:0>There is no doubt in my mind that it will
further strengthen the bond we share.
I am, after all, the Sage of Water.
<sp:3:0:2:0701>I am certain that it will prove useful on
your journey as well!

I am with you in spirit, now and always.
Should you ever need me, do not hesitate
to call upon me, my friend.
Talk_04:
<sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:Think>All of us sages have at last gathered in
support of our shared goal as our final
battle with the Demon King approaches.
I am in a state of constant readiness
so that we can go to battle at a
moment's notice.
<sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:Determination_00>Link...<sp:5:0:0> Such difficult times will only
strengthen our bond.<sp:5:1:0> I'm readyâ€”ready to
face the Demon King with you, my friend.
